page.title: 09A Warden's Day
page.content: The Warden lives in a lodge at one of the two official entrances to the Park. The Park usually opens at 8 am and closes at dusk, however, due to the size of the area it is impossible to keep people out of the Park outside of these times.Providing they are not causing damage to the plant life or wildlife then it tends to be accepted that people can walk or jog through the Park early in the morning or late at night. There are many jobs to do during the day such as repairing paths and fencing, carrying counts of wildlife, checking the level of water in the lake and showing organised parties of visitors around. The warden often patrols in the middle of the night with his two huge dogs. This is definitely not a nine to five job.
